name: inexplicably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that cannot be explained or understood: Inexplicably, the men were never questioned about where the explosives came from. An experienced sailor had inexplicably disappeared in calm waters. See
inexplicable
More examplesFewer examplesThings keep vanishing inexplicably from their house.The lights inexplicably dimmed for a few seconds.Inexplicably, the fire department was not immediately called when flames broke out.
